entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
